title: Seek & Shoot
description: It was an Attack Hole style game, we had to find weapons and try to kill boss with them.

title: Nonstop Fight
description: It was a cool dungeon crawler game.

title: Light Workers
description: One of my favorite, was my first project in Hygge Studios.

title: Pirate Bay
description: Unfortunatelly studio had to close down before i finished it. It was a hybrid casual game with an (almost)open world, islands, ship markets, crew markets and pirate fights.

title: Coin Breaker
description: Published by Cube Games, you had to break stacked coins. Coins are only breakable if they are in the same color. You can also upgrade cannons to make them more powerful.

title: Arrow Team
description: It wasa grid base merge game, you have to buy and place units to defend your base. You can also upgrade your units.

title: Melt Master
description: Made with mesh generation and deformation, you had to break ice blocks to reach the goal. You can also upgrade your tools to make them more powerful.

title: Match The Color Ball
description: You have to match the color of the ball with the color of the platform. You can also upgrade your ball to make it more powerful.

title: Money Up
description: Simple runner-like game, you have to collect moneys to level up and merge money bags. You can also upgrade your character to start higher level.

title: Slingshot Race
description: Drag your car to throw it, you can merge other cars to make your car more powerful. You can also upgrade your car to make it more powerful.

title: Bikini Evolution
description: A game about bikinis. Go through year doors and level up your bikini.

title: Bizarre Cocktail
description: Try to make most disgusting cocktail. At the end of the level, a character tries to drink it, if he can't drink it, you win.

title: Rich Rush
description: An endless runner game, collect coins to get more bullet, avoid enemies and obstacles.

title: Drag King
description: A racing game, collect moneys and buy much better car parts. Race your opponent at the end of the level.

title: Dribbling Master
description: Dribble and shoot the ball to the basket. Avoid enemy team and get more points. You will slamdunk the ball at the end of the level.

title: Phonecase Evolution
description: Collect phones, get them case, paint them and avoid obstacles. Bring more phones to the end of the level to get more points.

title: Mr. Fang
description: You are a vampire lord and gathering your army. You are fighting werewolf boss at the end of every 2 level. Collect humans and turn them into vampires, transform bats and fly over obstacles!

title: The Word
description: A Quiz game about music. You have to guess 3 questions to get turn all the judges.

title: Lens Runner
description: Avoid obstacless and collect lens to see much clearer and of the level.

title: Salad Party!
description: Kill vegetables with a razor gun and make a salad with them.

title: The Office
description: A slingshot game with The Office characters. Drag the character to the slingshot and release to shoot.

title: Jevelry Run
description: Collect beads to make your bracelet. Avoid the obstacles and collect the beads. Rope was a mesh.
